column1: The Hobbiton Road was a road in the Shire. It started in Bywater branching off the East Road and passed through HobbitonA Part of the Shire map. It was lined with trees.
During Sharkeys occupations the trees were replaced by ugly houses.

The Road is mentioned in the narrative but it is not marked in A Part of the Shire and therefore it is not known which portion of which road is the Hobbiton Road. Robert Foster identifies this Road as passing through Hobbiton and then around Hobbiton Hill and on to OverhillRobert Foster
column3: entry Hobbiton Road. The Encyclopedia of Arda identifies the road as "at least" the portion between Bywater and Hobbiton.
